#Problem 1 
##Problem 1.1a - create a variable and assign value of 35
```{r}
my_first_variable <- 35
```

##Problem 1.1b - divide 1st var by 9 and round to 3 sig figs
```{r}
my_second_variable <- signif(my_first_variable/9, 3)
```

##Problem 1.1c - print 2nd variable
```{r}
print(my_second_variable)
```

##Problem 1.1d - use floor() to round 2nd var to nearest int
```{r}
my_third_variable <- floor(my_second_variable)
```

##Problem 1.1e - print 3rd variable
```{r}
print(my_third_variable)
```

##Problem 1.2a - set seed for reproducability
```{r}
set.seed(8675309)
```

##Problem 1.2b - plot data from norm dist, mean 500, sd 10
```{r}
plot_data <- rnorm(20, mean=500, sd=10)
plot(plot_data,
     ylab = "Value",            # Y-axis label
     main = "Random Sample Norm Dist, Mean = 500 & SD = 10"  # Title
     )
```
